item.title: Projects
item.description: Our lab work on mites that are agricultural pests and focuses on several aspect research, primarily related to mite-plant interactions. We use molecular tools such as DNA and RNA isolation and sequencing, confocal microscopy using immunostaining and FISH methods as well as, in the near future, proteomic tools to investigate the various questions we still have about mites from different families. Our current main research topics are: 1. Molecular taxonomy and genetic markers search in various mite families.
